### schedNode() {#ab76f5e165cdf261f940b854e739a789b}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void ConvergingVLIWScheduler::schedNode (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42; SU, bool IsTopNode)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Update the scheduler&#39;s state after scheduling a node.

This is the same node that was just returned by <a href="#a3bee087d8d270d2eb8823dc5b9dd4e0e">pickNode()</a>. However, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vliwmachinescheduler">VLIWMachineScheduler</a> needs to update it&#39;s state based on the current cycle before <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineschedstrategy">MachineSchedStrategy</a> does.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/vliwmachinescheduler-h/#l00232">232</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/vliwmachinescheduler-h">VLIWMachineScheduler.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/vliwmachinescheduler-cpp/#l00996">996</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/vliwmachinescheduler-cpp">VLIWMachineScheduler.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### pickNodeFromQueue() {#aa641d58b022e9702656e1a58369931e5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ConvergingVLIWScheduler::CandResult ConvergingVLIWScheduler::pickNodeFromQueue (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/vliwschedboundary">VLIWSchedBoundary</a> &amp; Zone, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regpressuretracker">RegPressureTracker</a> &amp; RPTracker, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/convergingvliwscheduler/schedcandidate">SchedCandidate</a> &amp; Candidate)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Pick the best candidate from the top queue.

TODO: getMaxPressureDelta results can be mostly cached for each <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> during DAG building. To adjust for the current scheduling location we need to maintain the number of vreg uses remaining to be top-scheduled.

### pressureChange() {#a72c1f9735ae80acb1e429fa095ce3739}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>int ConvergingVLIWScheduler::pressureChange (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42; SU, bool isBotUp)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> if the instruction changes the register pressure of a register in the high pressure set.

The function returns a negative value if the pressure decreases and a positive value is the pressure increases. If the instruction doesn&#39;t use a high pressure register or doesn&#39;t change the register pressure, then return 0.
